summary: Three London gentlemen take vacation rowing down the Thames, encountering various mishaps and misadventures along the way.
cast: Andrey Mironov|Aleksandr Shirvindt|Mikhail Derzhavin|Larisa Golubkina|Alina Pokrovskaya|Irina Mazurkevich|Georgiy Shtil|Zinoviy Gerdt|Tatyana Pelttser|A. Andreev|Nikolay Boyarskiy
title: Troe v lodke, ne schitaya sobaki
